Reviews.Title: “My Beautiful Trip to Paris”
Reviews.Author: elyrivera
Reviews.Content: stayed western de hotel 5 nights january 3 8 2012 hotel located rue residential quiet 5 minute walk restaurants cafeterias shops metro walk 20 minutes arc triomphe champ elyses avenue paris plenty shops restaurants night clubs etc front desk clerks polite courteous specially zoe speaks spanish fluently native language magdalena speaks english orientation visit paris excellent daily breakfast request advices recommendations own tours zoe upgrade stayed superior spacious tv safe box queen bed beautifully decorated red curtains free wifi personal computer lobby printer free charge buffet breakfast variety cereals fruits breads cheeses yogourt scramble boiled eggs juices etc facilities hotel clean recommend hotel excellent service location rates undoubtedly return stay excellent hotel
